attributes.action: We the people of the U.K. insist on the prorogue of Parliament please share
attributes.additional_details:
I have lived in the U.K. all my life and can trace my family line back to 1060
I think my family over the years has earned me the right to express my opinion
attributes.background: it Is important that two sides of an argument get a chance to show the amount of support. In a democracy at least
